snippet: Secretary of State John Kerry delayed an anticipated trip to Russia and the two sides issued dueling accounts of their recent diplomacy to defuse the crisis in Ukraine.
abstract: Obama administration's effort to solicit Russia's help to defuse the crisis in Ukraine hits a roadblock when Secretary of State John Kerry delays an anticipated trip to Russia and the two sides issue dueling accounts of their recent diplomacy.

byline.original: By MICHAEL R. GORDON and STEVEN LEE MYERS
byline.contributor: Michael R. Gordon reported from Washington, and Steven Lee Myers from Moscow.

lead_paragraph: Secretary of State John Kerry delayed an anticipated trip to Russia and the two sides issued dueling accounts of their recent diplomacy to defuse the crisis in Ukraine.

headline.main: U.S. and Russia Hit Diplomatic Roadblock Trying to Start Ukraine Talks
headline.print_headline: U.S. and Russia Hit Diplomatic Roadblock Trying to Start Ukraine Talks
